actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1161.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 6027) to clarify the application of the Clayton Act to the official conduct of local governments, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 6027 (local government antitrust liability).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 6027) to clarify the application of the Clayton Act to the official conduct of local governments, and for other purposes.
